Model.GameObjects

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.GameObjects.Board
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBoard

    public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBoard
    Board class is the central class handling models and game logic.

        Parameters:

        height - height of the board.
